signin.title: Sign In
signin.text2: We are glad to see again!
signin.text3: We are quite sure you have been doing this hundreds times before, so, no need to explain what you need to do, fields on the left side.

contact.title: Contact
contact.pageTitle: Wanna talk? Sure, glad to hear you!
contact.content: We'd be glad to hear any feedback, propositions, found bugs or news about your day.
contact.emailRequest: What do you want to tell us?

error.title: Not found
error.pageTitle: It's quite empty here, isn't it?
error.content: Not sure what you were trying to found, but it's defensively not here
error.link: Try to find it somewhere else
